original_text: And they shall come against thee with chariots, wagons, and wheels, and with an assembly of people, which shall set against thee buckler and shield and helmet round about: and I will set judgment before them, and they shall judge thee according to their judgments.
korean_text: 그들이 무기와 병거와 수레와 크고 작은 방패를 이끌고 투구 쓴 군대를 거느리고 치러 와서 너를 에워싸리라 내가 재판을 그들에게 맡긴즉 그들이 그들의 법대로 너를 재판하리라

sentences.original_text: And they shall come against thee
and with an assembly of people
buckler and shield and helmet round about:
and I will set judgment before them,
and they shall judge thee according to their judgments.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들의 심판에 따라 너를 심판하리라.
